name: GitHub
title: github.com
shortDescription: GitHub is a development platform where millions of developers and companies build, ship, and maintain their software. It offers tools like GitHub Copilot for AI-powered code suggestions, advanced security features to manage vulnerabilities, and Actions for workflow automation. GitHub is ideal for teams of any size, from startups to large enterprises, facilitating collaboration and increasing efficiency across various industries.
cons: Complexity can be overwhelming for beginners
Can be expensive for larger teams

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Bitbucket
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Good for small teams, integrates with Jira
